user.title: Connect to Iternio
user.description:
Enter your Iternio API Key to proceed with OAuth authentication.

[Get your API key here](https://www.iternio.com/api)

oauth.title: Authenticate with Iternio
oauth.description: You will be redirected to Iternio to authorize access. Please complete the authorization process and return to Home Assistant.
